glsa.title: Kopete: Vulnerability in included Gadu library
glsa.synopsis: Kopete is vulnerable to several input validation vulnerabilities which may lead to execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: KDE is a feature-rich graphical desktop environment for Linux and Unix-like Operating Systems. Kopete (also part of kdenetwork) is the KDE Instant Messenger.

description.p: Kopete contains an internal copy of libgadu and is therefore subject to several input validation vulnerabilities in libgadu.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code or crash Kopete.
